name: JackyrRemoveCurrency

infos.name: Remove Currency
infos.description:
Enhance the shopping experience on your Shopware store with our custom plugin. Research has shown that seeing currency symbols can be a reminder of payment and lower conversions. Our plugin eliminates this by removing currency symbols throughout the frontend, creating a stress-free shopping environment.

With just a few clicks, you can install and activate the plugin and immediately see the results. The seamless shopping experience provided by removing currency symbols has been proven to increase conversions and boost turnover, making it a profitable investment for your online business.

Transform your Shopware store into a user-friendly platform that drives success. Don't let currency symbols hold you back - upgrade your store now with our hassle-free plugin and see the difference for yourself.
infos.installationManual: When you've purchased the plugin, you can install it in your Shopware installation through your personal account. Then you need to activate the plugin. Because it's a plug-and-play plugin, you'll immediately see the results. No other configurations are needed.
infos.shortDescription: Research has shown that seeing currency symbols can be a reminder of payment and lower conversions. Our plugin eliminates this by removing currency symbols throughout the frontend.
infos.highlights:
Boost your conversions
Plug-and-play plugin
Changes applies to the entire storefront

infos.name: Remove Currency
infos.description:
Enhance the shopping experience on your Shopware store with our custom plugin. Research has shown that seeing currency symbols can be a reminder of payment and lower conversions. Our plugin eliminates this by removing currency symbols throughout the frontend, creating a stress-free shopping environment.

With just a few clicks, you can install and activate the plugin and immediately see the results. The seamless shopping experience provided by removing currency symbols has been proven to increase conversions and boost turnover, making it a profitable investment for your online business.

Transform your Shopware store into a user-friendly platform that drives success. Don't let currency symbols hold you back - upgrade your store now with our hassle-free plugin and see the difference for yourself.
infos.installationManual: When you've purchased the plugin, you can install it in your Shopware installation through your personal account. Then you need to activate the plugin. Because it's a plug-and-play plugin, you'll immediately see the results on the product detail page. If you want to remove the currency symbol from other places then the product detail page, then head over to the plugin settings and activate the right settings (don't forget to save).
infos.shortDescription: Research has shown that seeing currency symbols can be a reminder of payment and lower conversions. Our plugin eliminates this by removing currency symbols throughout the frontend.
infos.highlights:
